Reviews.Title: Would be great if wifi worked properly
Reviews.Author: Bree
Reviews.Content: This laptop so far has been great. I bought it for school, gaming and digital artwork(Photoshop and whatnot). It's not totally silent, but it's not really loud either. The only time the fan runs a lot is during gaming as it does heat up quickly, but I assume that's normal for a laptop when gaming. I plan to buy a cooling pad so it doesn't die. I haven't tested how it well plays many games yet. So far I've just played Everquest Landmark's open beta and Minecraft, it could play Landmark smoothly on medium settings, but was laggy on high. I don't know if this is normal or not since I unfortunately don't know a whole lot about the graphics card aside from Nvidia GTX cards are gaming cards and 860M should be good. The colorful backlit keyboard is a plus, very nice.The only con so far is Windows 8, I just don't really like it, and using a track pad with Windows 8 is such a huge pain, stuff pops up randomly just from my palm touching it while I'm typing. So I plugged a mouse in to use instead.Before this laptop I had bought an Asus from Best Buy that was around $1000, but it couldn't even play Minecraft so I returned it. So glad I did and got this one instead. I plan to update the review later if anything bad happens.Update 4/20/14I started having some problems this week similar to that other reviewer, the laptop won't stay connected to the wifi or the browser starts loading incredibly slow. I attempted to fix the problem but nothing has worked so far. The only thing that puts the computer back to normal temporarily is restarting. Considering returning it if I can't solve the problem soon.Update 4/23/14Couldn't fix it, returning it.

Reviews.Title: exactly what I purchased
Reviews.Author: Jeremiah
Reviews.Content: No gripes about this laptop. It plays every game well, buy a cooling pad but that's normal for laptops.MSI is a fantastic brand to purchase from!

Reviews.Title: Excellent choice for gamers on a budget
Reviews.Author: Leon Rodriguez
Reviews.Content: I got this laptop with the need for gaming and portability in one package. This need was fulfilled by this laptop. This laptop is a good choice for those headed to college or those who just need a laptop with hurting their wallet.Also for those who don't know. If the battery symbol says your battery isn't charging, that's because MSI's battery don't charge unless they're under 95%.Pros+Cheap gaming laptop with great performance when plugged in (I'm able to run Skyrim + mods at steady 60 fps with all settings  except shadows maxed out)+Steel series keyboard (Very nice keyboard,it's customizable light up is a good plus too)+Non-glare screen (useful when under sunlight)+lightweight for a 17.3 laptopCons-Windows 8 (stop forcing it on us Microsoft)-Beware playing on battery as it cuts gaming performance by half-Glossy finish is a fingerprint magnet-Only one fan on the left side which might make your left hand sweatI'll try to keep my experience updated over the months.

Reviews.Title: Very good but hard to update!!!!
Reviews.Author: Angela Maria Lamprecht Hollossy
Reviews.Content: This notebook is great until I wanted to install 2 mSATA 128GB each, the problem started when I was in the process of installing, which I did wrong, now I can not enter the UEFI bios, the machine works correctly, only now stopped working bios or pressing DEL or F12, F2 .. anything .. if anyone knows of this problem could help me ..

Reviews.Title: I am surprised how well the the graphics are for ...
Reviews.Author: Brenton Tyring
Reviews.Content: I am surprised how well the the graphics are for the laptop and overall of the performance of this laptop. Definitely runs everything really well and I have not had any issues with the laptop itself.

Reviews.Title: Will return
Reviews.Author: machinistmate
Reviews.Content: The wifi keeps dropping or unstable. My 4 year old laptop is connected to my wifi 24/7, this laptop cant even have a stable connection longer than an hr
